title: Homes from home: they're very good to us here
creator_credit: Gordon Croton and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Documentary series aimed at social workers. This episode presents a historical view over a hundred years of institutions and workhouses for the elderly, disabled and children thorugh to 1975.
